headline: Is Zoetis (ZTS) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Zoetis is offering good value at its current price, this article explains what the numbers may indicate about the stock. Zoetis recently closed at US$129.37, with returns of 2.3% over the last week, 9.0% over the last month, 2.7% year to date, a 19.8% decline over the last year, a 13.5% decline over three years, and an 18.5% decline over five years. Recent news coverage around Zoetis has focused on its position in animal health and its role as a major pure play...
